member.name: M:Penguin.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationProviderExtensions.Get(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationProvider,System.String)
member.summary: Calls TryGet on an IConfiguration provider
member.returns: The value (or null) of the key

member.name: M:Penguin.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationProviderExtensions.GetDictionary(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationProvider,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string value from an IConfigurationProvider as a Dictionary, assuming its delimited in Key=Value; notation
member.param: The provider to use as a source
member.returns: A dictionary representing the key value pairs found in the configuration value
